name: bookmark_tweet
description: Bookmark a tweet for later reading.

parameters.name: tweet_url
parameters.description: Full URL of the tweet to bookmark

steps.code: const bookmarkBtn = document.querySelector('[data-testid$="bookmark"]'); const unbookmarkBtn = document.querySelector('[data-testid$="removeBookmark"]'); if (unbookmarkBtn) return { already_bookmarked: true, message: 'Tweet is already bookmarked' }; if (bookmarkBtn) { bookmarkBtn.click(); return { success: true, message: 'Tweet bookmarked' }; } return { success: false, message: 'Bookmark button not found' }
steps.name: result
steps.label: Bookmark the tweet
